sentences.en: An important note about sleeping is that there are spurious wake - ups.
sentences.cn: 关于休眠有一点需要注意,存在虚假的唤醒.

sentences.en: Care must be exercised to prevent thermal strains from introducing spurious outputs.
sentences.cn: 必须注意防止热变形所引起的附加输出.

sentences.en: He demolished the Opposition’s spurious arguments.
sentences.cn: 他推翻了反对党那些站不住脚的论点。

sentences.en: He had managed to create the entirely spurious impression that the company was thriving.
sentences.cn: 他设法制造出一种彻头彻尾的假象，让人误以为公司一派兴旺。

sentences.en: Mr Simon said he was not against taxes as such, "but I do object when taxation is justified on spurious or dishonest grounds," he says.
sentences.cn: 西蒙先生说他对税收本身并不反对，“但是我反对以虚假不实的理由巧立明目收税，”他说。

sentences.en: Naturally a small number of valid results will also be rejected, and some spurious data accepted.
sentences.cn: 自然,少数正确的结果也会被舍弃掉, 而一些乱真的数据却被接受进来.

sentences.en: Quite a lot of allegations of misjustice are spurious.
sentences.cn: 有关不公正的指控有不少是虚假的。

sentences.en: Signal which prevents accidental operation by spurious signals or avoids possible ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 防止假信号的意外作用或者避免二义性而设置的信号.

sentences.en: Slight mismatches in the transmission properties at the interfaces generate spurious signals.
sentences.cn: 由于介面两侧的传输属性可能略有差异,因此会制造假讯号.

sentences.en: The justification of this chart is entirely spurious.
sentences.cn: 这张图表的依据完全站不住脚。

sentences.en: The reason for this sudden spate of spurious insinuation?
sentences.cn: 突然爆发的这些恶意指责,原因是什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: There are some spurious lines in this ancient poem, which were added later.
sentences.cn: 这首诗中有几行假托的诗句是后人加上去的.

sentences.en: This response of the school - boy lies at the bottom of all spurious profundity.
sentences.cn: 小学生的这种反应是一切貌似深奥的东西的起因.

sentences.en: Torsional microslip at the clamps results in spurious torques which act like pivot friction torques.
sentences.cn: 夹紧处扭杆的微小滑移会产生干扰力矩,它的作用和轴颈的摩擦力矩一样.

sentences.en: When you go to the fair, beware of the quacks selling spurious medicinal herbs.
sentences.cn: 你赶集的时候, 当心卖假草药的江湖医生.
威廉斯插入了许多伪造的素材。

words.tran_cn: 伪造地；不合逻辑地；虚假地

trans.tran_cn: 假的，伪造的，欺骗性的，谬误的，私生的，赝
